dict.string: AllTime uses your health data to provide insights.
AllTime uses clinical records to improve insights.
App needs access to your calendar.
App needs access to your reminders.
Chrona needs full access to your reminders to sync reminders created in the app to your iOS Reminders app.
AllTime uses your location to suggest nearby lunch spots and walking routes during your free time.
AllTime uses your location to provide personalized lunch and walking recommendations based on your schedule.
